title: Cream Cheese Italian Pasta Casserole
directions: Using a large oven safe skillet, if you have one, brown your meat and season with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Bump the heat up to medium high if it isn't already and add your sauce.
Cook until your sauce just starts to bubble from the heat, but not boil. If it starts to boil, turn your heat down.
Add your cream cheese, stir until thoroughly combined.
Add your pasta to your skillet and stir to coat the pasta.
If your not using an oven safe skillet, place the meat/pasta mix into a baking dish.
Top with shredded mozzarella and parmesan.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until your cheese is melted and the sauce is bubbly.
ingredients: 1 pound pasta cooked according to directions (we used spirals, but any will do)
1 jar your favorite red sauce (we use Simply Balanced from Target)
